headline: 5 Must-Read Analyst Questions From Netflix’s Q4 Earnings Call
summary: Netflix’s fourth quarter was marked by robust revenue growth and operating margin expansion, but the market reacted negatively, with shares falling over 5%. Management pointed to continued subscriber momentum and a growing advertising business as key drivers of the quarter. Co-CEO Gregory Peters highlighted, “We delivered 16% revenue growth, roughly 30% operating profit growth, expanding margins, growing key free cash flow, Ad sales, two and a half times in 2025.” The company also emphasized pro
